Package ohos.miscservices.pasteboard

Class PasteData.Record

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.miscservices.pasteboard.PasteData.Record
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sequenceable
    Enclosing class:
    PasteData

    public static class PasteData.Record
extends Object
implements Sequenceable
    This class defines single pasted data as Record, which can be plain text, HTML text, URIs, and intents. A PasteData object contains one or more records. Each record contains only one paragraph of plain text or HTML text, a URI, or an intent.
    Since:
    1

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface ohos.utils.Sequenceable

        Sequenceable.Producer<T>

      • convertToText

        public CharSequence convertToText​(Context context)
        Forcibly converts the content in a pasteboard Record object to text.

        This method follows the following conversion rules:

        • If the content mimeType is PasteData.MIMETYPE_TEXT_PLAIN, this method returns the plain text.
        • If the content mimeType is PasteData.MIMETYPE_TEXT_HTML, this method removes HTML elements, such as tags and tabs, and returns the plain text only.
        • If the content mimeType is PasteData.MIMETYPE_TEXT_URI, this method reads and returns the text contained in the URI. If the reading fails, null is returned.
        • If the content mimeType is PasteData.MIMETYPE_TEXT_INTENT, this method converts the Intent to a URI of the text format. For details, see Intent.toUri().
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the caller context, which is used to obtain information such as DataAbilityHelper.
        Returns:
        Returns the text representation of the Record object if the operation is successful; returns null otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • marshalling

        public boolean marshalling​(Parcel parcel)
